title: The Typeface used in the the Official Seal of the President of the US
content:
Hello Everyone,

I've seen a few versions of the seal online and was wondering if you could tell me which is the official  
seal (the one attached?) and what is the typeface used? Times Roman Bold?

Thanks so much.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [President of US Seal.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312203919/http:/typophile.com/files/President%20of%20US%20Seal.jpg) | 54.26 KB |
author: ishanz

comments.content:
Here's the picture of the seal that's linked from whitehouse.gov:

[http://www.whitehouse.gov/history/eeobtour/images/seal-presidential-colo...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150312203919/http:/www.whitehouse.gov/history/eeobtour/images/seal-presidential-color.html "http://www.whitehouse.gov/history/eeobtour/images/seal-presidential-color.html")

I always thought it was a Baskerville, but I may be wrong.
